    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Action
     
    ActionHandler
     
    AddInternationalStringsHandler
     
    AddPluginActionHandler
     
    ApplicationContext
    Non-instantiable class for managing the context, state, and environment of the application This class provides many useful fields, lists, data, and methods Be sure to read the documentation carefully as the methods in this class can significantly alter the function of the application
    AutoSaveWorker
    Class representing the repeating task of autosaving a document for a particular JPEdit Window
    CancelButton
    Class representing a Cancel button.
    ChangeAutoSaveTimeActionHandler
     
    ChangeLocaleHandler
     
    ChangeLocalePrompt
    Prompts the user to change their Locale using a JavaFX Stage
    ClearRecentFilesHandler
     
    CloseWindowActionHandler
     
    ConfirmationDialog
    Class representing a dialog prompt to ask the user to confirm or cancel something This class provides no external behavior; it shows a dialog, pauses the thread until the user answers and returns the choice.
    ConfirmationType
     
    DependableStage
    A DependableStage is a Stage that can have dependents.
    DependantStage
    This class represents a stage which depends on other stages These DependantStages will close when their owner is closed They can be prevented from opening multiple times
    Deprecated
     
    DirtyCheckHandler
     
    Driver
     
    DuplicateWindowActionHandler
     
    FindActionHandler
     
    FindCache
     
    FindDialog
     
    FindDialogNextActionHandler
     
    FindDialogPreviousActionHandler
     
    FindReplaceBase
     
    FontChangeActionHandler
     
    FontPrompt
     
    FontStyleParser
    Used to parse the input of a change font prompt when the user chooses a font
    FontUtil
     
    HelpDialog
     
    InternationalLanguageSelector
     
    InternationalStringEditorWindow
     
    JPEditAdvancedMenu
     
    JPEditEditMenu
     
    JPEditFileMenu
     
    JPEditFileRecentItemsMenu
     
    JPEditFormatMenu
     
    JPEditMenu
     
    JPEditPlugin
     
    JPEditPluginMenu
     
    JPEditWindow
    This class represents a text editor window of JPEdit
    JPEditWindowKeyHandler
     
    JPLogger
     
    JPPluginAPI
    This class helps plugins interface with JPEdit.
    JPUtil
    This class contains many convenience methods for interacting with the application and environment
    LoadedJPPlugin
    This class is an internal representation of a JPEditPlugin after it has been loaded by the program This class is specific to the function of the program and should not be interacted with by a particular plugin's implementation.
    NewActionHandler
     
    NewWindowActionHandler
     
    NoButton
    Class representing a No button.
    OkButton
    Class representing a OK button.
    OpenActionHandler
     
    OpenRecentActionHandler
     
    PasteActionHandler
     
    PluginKeyboardShortcut
     
    PluginKeyboardShortcutAction<Event>
     
    PluginKeyboardShortcutBuilder
     
    PluginMenuItem
     
    PluginOwnedComponent
     
    PluginProperties
    Class representing the user-interactable properties of a JPEdit Plugin See JPEditPlugin.pluginProperties() for more information
    PluginToolbarButton
     
    PrintActionHandler
     
    RemovePluginActionHandler
     
    RemovePluginSelectionStage
     
    ReplaceActionHandler
     
    ReplaceAllItemHandler
     
    ReplaceDialog
     
    ReplaceItemHandler
     
    SaveActionHandler
     
    SaveAsActionHandler
     
    SelectAllActionHandler
     
    Strings
    Non-instantiable class for interacting with Internationalization (I18n).
    Strings.Content
    Contains the constants which represent the keys in the .properties file.
    TextAreaTextChangeListener
     
    TimeDateActionHandler
     
    TimeDatePrompt
     
    ToggleFullPathHandler
     
    ToggleWrapTextActionHandler
     
    UserPreferences
    Class representing user preferences specific to this Application.
    Version
     
    YesButton
    Class representing a YES button.
